scripts.clone: if [ ! -d '/var/www/focus-pocus.ro' ]; then sudo git clone https://github.com/CHINuit/focus-pocus.ro /var/www/focus-pocus.ro; fi
scripts.sync: cd /var/www/focus-pocus.ro &&sudo git stash save --keep-index && sudo git pull --force origin master
scripts.install: cd /var/www/focus-pocus.ro && sudo if [ -d /var/www/focus-pocus.ro/node_modules ]; then sudo rm -r /var/www/focus-pocus.ro/node_modules fi && sudo  npm install --global && sudo  npm audit fix
scripts.bld: sudo npm run start && sudo npm run build
